text: avara balige olitenadaru bandaga avaru, navu idakke ar'haru, ennuttiddaru. Innu avarige ahitavenadaru sambhavisidaga, adakkagi avaru musa mattu avara jotegarara bhagyavannu mudalisuttiddaru. Tilidirali! Khanditavagiyu avara bhagyavellavu allahana baliyalle ide. Adare heccinavaru aritiruvudilla
